answers.answer: a low ifg level could mean pre diabetes..and elevated platlets could be that she is fighting off some infection.

question: i have a daughter who has a igf level of <25. she is not underweight for her height, but is 13 1/2 months old and 14 1/2 lbs and 26.3 in long. i just got a phone call with the results but they wouldnt explain over the phone what this means. please help. my appointment isnt for 2 more months!!she also has an elevated platelet count. her father died of a massive pulmonary embolism so i am terrified about this as well.
title: IGF of <25 in a 1 year old
